rules.description: left control + left shift + ` (backtick) - launches iTerm2

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "iTerm"' -e 'if (count windows) is 0 then create window with default profile' -e activate -e end

rules.description: left control + left shift + 1 - launches Safari

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Safari"' -e 'if (count windows) is 0 then make new document' -e activate -e end

rules.description: left control + left shift + 2 - launches Google Chrome

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell app "Google Chrome"' -e 'if (count windows) is 0 then make new window' -e activate -e end
